name: Nils Werner
body:
### Bio

I am a PhD student at the [International Audiolabs Erlangen](https://www.audiolabs-erlangen.de/).

### Research

My research focus is audio processing and specifically [lapped transforms for audio coding](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lapped_transform).

### Publications

 1. Fabian-Robert St√∂ter, Nils Werner, Stefan Bayer and Bernd Edler  
    **Refining Fundamental Frequency Estimates using Time Warping**
    In Proc. European Signal Processing Conf. (EUSIPCO), 2015.

### Other contributions

 - [Short Time Fourier Transform (STFT) in NumPy](https://github.com/audiolabs/stft)
 - [Modulated Discrete Cosine Transform (MDCT) in Python](https://github.com/audiolabs/mdct)
 - [Several small improvements to SciPy](https://github.com/scipy/scipy/blob/master/THANKS.txt#L121)
 - [Among top 4% of StackOverflow users](https://stackoverflow.com/users/636626/nils-werner)
